name: questioningly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that expresses doubt about the value or truth of something, or that shows you want an answer from someone: He raised his eyebrows questioningly. When she looked questioningly at her husband, he shook his head to show he had nothing to say.
More examplesFewer examplesHis hesitancy made her look questioningly at him. They all looked at her questioningly and she explained: "I was just thinking aloud".The waitress who had been covering for Doyle behind the bar eyed the baseball bat questioningly when he returned.
